name: Tesla's Quest
description:
Your quest for world illumination has been thwarted and the pieces of your tower have been scattered across the multi-verses.  You will need to locate all 9 pieces to restore the tower and illuminate the world. You will face many enemies as you search for chest filled with ether force, weapons and the missing pieces.

Good luck , Beware all who enter here!

A must have for all Tesla fans!

Speed Player Challenger- All is lost!
